name: Root Bound (GodIsPoohBearPDX, Kavan Bahrami, Chris Gruchacz Composer, Jordan Kulm, nsticco)
name_original: Root Bound (GodIsPoohBearPDX, Kavan Bahrami, Chris Gruchacz Composer, Jordan Kulm, nsticco)
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure as a single raindrop, tumbling down from the clouds and destined for the earth below. Navigate through an unpredictable journey filled with obstacles and twists. Make the most of your brief moment as you phase through your cyclic journey. But be warned, one wrong move could lead to a SPLAT!

INPUT:
To "Start Game / DROP" use the Enter Key or Gamepad Start.
To "MOVE" around as you fall, use WASD or Arrows or Gamepad Joystick.
To "SLOW" your fall, use the Shift Key or Gamepad Left Trigger.

Global Game Jam, 2023, Hosted by the PIGsquad
public repo for the project: https://github.com/jkulm/ggj2023

Kavan Bahrami: Tech Artist
Ezra Sandzer-Bell: Music
Jacob Bruns: 3D Modeling and textures
Shepherd Duff - Tech Artist
Chris Gruchacz: Sound Design, Audio Implementation
Jordan Kulm: Tech Art
Stevie Smith: 3d Modeling and design
Nathaniel Sticco: Gameplay Engineer
